content:
It appears that there are a few different shoes that are currently considered best-selling or popular in the market.

According to [1](https://www.walkjogrun.net/best-selling-shoes-reviewed/), the Red Wing Iron Ranger is one of the top-selling shoes, known for its high quality, comfort, and durability.

Additionally, [2](https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-selling-shoes) suggests that the Zayla Block Heel Sandals, a versatile and comfortable option, are also on the list of best-selling shoes.

From [3](https://vanscom.us/what-is-the-most-sold-shoe-in-2021/), Nike continues to be the number one global shoe market in the fiscal year ending May 31, 2021, with $28 billion in shoe sales. More specifically, Nike Air Force 1 Low, which is currently celebrating its 40th anniversary, is reported to be the most popular and most sold shoe.

Lastly, [4](https://www.honestbrandreviews.com/reviews/best-shoe-brands/) shows that Nike is considered to be one of the best shoe brands and its running shoes are considered to be a popular name when it comes to shoes, as they offer quality products to their customers.

So, to market more you can consider adding Red Wing Iron Ranger, Zayla Block Heel Sandals, Nike Air Force 1 Low and any other running shoes of Nike to your collection. It's always better to diversify your product line and to keep an eye on the trend and best sellers which can help you to attract more customers.
